name: Sale
desc: Sale contract which throws a sale for reserve token against a redeemable erc20 token which can be later redeemed.

inputs.name: Recepient Address
inputs.desc: The recipient of the proceeds of a Sale, if/when the Sale is successful.

inputs.name: Reserve Token Address
inputs.desc: The reserve token address that the Sale is deonominated in.

inputs.name: Sale Timeout
inputs.desc: The number of seconds before this sale can timeout. SHOULD be well after the expected end time as a timeout will fail an active or pending sale regardless of any funds raised.

inputs.name: Minimum Raise Threshold
inputs.desc: Defines the amount of reserve required to raise that defines success/fail of the sale. Reaching the minimum raise DOES NOT cause the raise to end early (unless the 'can live' expression allows it of course).

inputs.name: Dust Size
inputs.desc: The minimum amount of rTKN that must remain in the Sale contract unless it is all purchased, clearing the raise to 0 stock and thus ending the raise.

inputs.name: Reddemable ERC20 Name
inputs.desc: Name of the Redeemable ERC20 token as defined by Open Zeppelin ERC20.

inputs.name: Reddemable ERC20 Symbol
inputs.desc: Symbol of the Redeemable ERC20 token as defined by Open Zeppelin ERC20.

inputs.name: Reddemable ERC20 Distributor
inputs.desc: Reddemable ERC20 distributor address of the initial supply, MAY be zero.

inputs.name: Reddemable ERC20 Initial Supply
inputs.desc: Redeemable ERC20 Initial supply to mint, MAY be zero.

inputs.name: Tier Address
inputs.desc: Tier contract address to gate the sale

inputs.name: Minimum Tier
inputs.desc: Minimum tier level of the Tier contract that is gating the sale required in order to be able to participate in the sale

inputs.name: Distribution End Forwarding Address
inputs.desc: Determines if the remaining Redeemable ERC20 tokens after the sale has ended in success should be burned or transfered to the Recepient address, 0x00 address would burn the remaining rTKNs.

expressions.name: Sale Expression
expressions.desc: An expression to calculate the rTKN price and sale's can live state.

cells.name: Caller
cells.desc: The contract or EOA that called transfer

cells.name: This Contract
cells.desc: The address of the Sale contract this expression is for
